        public static SimulationLogger consoleLogger()
        This logger prints all messages to System.out. Same as calling printStreamLogger(System.out).
        Returns:
        a new console logger

      • printStreamLogger

        public static SimulationLogger printStreamLogger(java.io.PrintStream printStream)

        Returns:
        a new print stream logger

      • createJDBCLogger

        public static SimulationLogger createJDBCLogger(ConnectionManager connectionManager,
                                                int commitThreshold)
        Create a new SimulationLogger which logs to an JDBC connection managed by given connectionManager. Insert queries are batch processed and only committed after the given commitThreshold or if the Closeable.close() is called. This logger is thread safe and not blocking, because it uses a Disruptor internally to process events.
        Parameters:
        connectionManager - the connection manager for sending the queries to
        commitThreshold - the threshold after which to commit a batch of queries
        Returns:
        a new JDBC logger
